sub_topic: The construction of the Cantor set.
message_1: What is the dimension of the Cantor set after removing the middle third of each line segment in the initial line segment of length 1? (Answer: the Cantor set has a fractal dimension of log(2)/log(3) ≈ 0.6309).
message_2: The Cantor set has a fractal dimension of log(2)/log(3) ≈ 0.6309.
